comment: Professor Hegna is very easy on the lab. However, the material of CSE1321 and CSE1321L is not very organized. Make sure you study and do the lab assignments. Good luck!

At the start of each lab, Kristin explains how to approach the exercises and even provides live code demos for more difficult problems. There are two types of assignments to keep track of: (i) weekly labs and (ii) weekly homework exercises, and she's available to help if you need it. Final is 50% of the grade, but she prepares thoroughly for it.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Skip class? You won't pass.--Caring

comment: Ms Hegna is a great coding instructor. I enjoyed her lectures! She also left examples related to our labs on the board when we were working on new material. This was really helpful to me as I am pretty new to coding. -Phi
